citations.narrative:
A large tree has fallen on the fence on the right side of the main enclosure fence housing 10 reindeer. The top line of the
fence is pressed down under the weight of the tree. The fence shall be repaired and the tree removed from the fence line
to prevent unwanted access into the enclosure and securely contain the reindeer within.
Correct by October 29, 2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
A large tree has fallen on the fence on the right side of the main enclosure fence housing 10 reindeer.  The top line of the 
fence is pressed down under the weight of the tree.  The fence shall be repaired and the tree removed from the fence line 
to prevent unwanted access into the enclosure and securely contain the reindeer within. 
Correct by October 29, 2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
